00020 #include <votca/ctp/segment.h>

00024 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00025    
00027 Segment::Segment(int id, string name)
00028         : _id(id),        _name(name),
00029           _has_e(false),  _has_h(false) { _eMpoles.resize(3); }
00030 
00031 // This constructor creates a copy of the stencil segment, without
00032 // adding it to any containers further up in the hierarchy; i.e. the topology
00033 // and molecules will neither know about the existence of this segment, nor
00034 // be able to access it. Used for creating the ghost in PB corrected pairs.
00035 Segment::Segment(Segment *stencil)
00036         : _id(stencil->getId()),    _name(stencil->getName()+"_ghost"),
00037           _typ(stencil->getType()), _top(NULL), _mol(NULL),
00038           _CoM(stencil->getPos()),
00039           _has_e(false), _has_h(false) { _eMpoles.resize(3);
00040 
00041     vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
00042     for (fit = stencil->Fragments().begin();
00043          fit < stencil->Fragments().end();
00044             fit++) {
00045 
00046         Fragment *newFrag = new Fragment(*fit);
00047         this->AddFragment(newFrag);
00048 
00049         vector<Atom*> ::iterator ait;
00050         for (ait = newFrag->Atoms().begin();
00051              ait < newFrag->Atoms().end();
00052              ait++) {
00053             this->AddAtom(*ait);
00054         }
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 Segment::~Segment() {
00060 
00061     vector < Fragment* > ::iterator fragit;
00062     for (fragit = this->Fragments().begin();
00063             fragit < this->Fragments().end();
00064             fragit++) {
00065         delete *fragit;
00066     }
00067     _fragments.clear();
00068     _atoms.clear();
00069 
00070     _eMpoles.clear();
00071     _polarSites.clear();
00072 }
00073 
00074 void Segment::TranslateBy(const vec &shift) {
00075 
00076     _CoM = _CoM + shift;
00077 
00078     vector < Fragment* > ::iterator fit;
00079     for (fit = _fragments.begin();
00080             fit < _fragments.end();
00081             fit++) {
00082 
00083         (*fit)->TranslateBy(shift);
00084     }
00085 }

00087 
00088 void Segment::setHasState(bool yesno, int state) {
00089 
00090     if (state == -1) {
00091         _has_e = yesno;
00092     }
00093     else if (state == +1) {
00094         _has_h = yesno;
00095     }
00096     else {
00097         throw std::runtime_error(" ERROR CODE whe__00e11h__");
00098     }
00099 }
00100 
00101 bool Segment::hasState(int state) {
00102 
00103     return (state == -1) ? _has_e : _has_h;
00104 }
00105

00107 void Segment::setOcc(double occ, int e_h) {
00108     
00109     if (e_h == -1) {
00110         _occ_e = occ;
00111     }
00112     else if (e_h == +1) {
00113         _occ_h = occ;
00114     }
00115     else {
00116         throw std::runtime_error(" ERROR CODE whe__00s11o__");
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 const double Segment::getOcc(int e_h) {
00122     
00123     return (e_h == -1) ? _occ_e : _occ_h;
00124 }

00186 
00187 const double Segment::getSiteEnergy(int state) {
00188 
00189     return (state == -1) ? this->getEMpoles(state) + _U_cC_nN_e :
00190                            this->getEMpoles(state) + _U_cC_nN_h;
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 void Segment::setEMpoles(int state, double energy) {
00195 
00196     _hasChrgState.resize(3);
00197     _hasChrgState[state+1] = true;
00198     _eMpoles[state+1] = energy;
00199 }
00200 
00201 
00202 const double Segment::getEMpoles(int state) {
00203 
00204     return _eMpoles[state+1] - _eMpoles[1];
00205 }

00207 
00208 void Segment::AddFragment( Fragment* fragment ) {
00209     _fragments.push_back( fragment );
00210     fragment->setSegment(this);
00211 }
00212 
00213 void Segment::AddAtom( Atom* atom ) {
00214     _atoms.push_back( atom );
00215     atom->setSegment(this);
00216 }
00217 
00218 void Segment::AddPolarSite( PolarSite *pole ) {
00219 
00220     _polarSites.push_back(pole);
00221     pole->setSegment(this);
00222 
00223 }
00224 
00225 void Segment::calcPos() {
00226     vec pos = vec(0,0,0);
00227     double totWeight = 0.0;
00228 
00229     for (int i = 0; i< _atoms.size(); i++) {
00230         pos += _atoms[i]->getPos() * _atoms[i]->getWeight();
00231         totWeight += _atoms[i]->getWeight();
00232     }
00233 
00234     _CoM = pos / totWeight;
00235 }
00236 
00237 void Segment::Rigidify() {
00238 
00239     if (this->getType()->canRigidify()) {
00240         // Establish which atoms to use to define local frame
00241         vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
00242 
00243         for (fit = this->Fragments().begin();
00244                 fit < this->Fragments().end();
00245                 fit++) {
00246                 (*fit)->Rigidify();
00247         }
00248     }
00249     else { return; }
00250 }

00252 
00253 void Segment::WritePDB(FILE *out, string tag1, string tag2) {
00254 
00255   if (tag1 == "Fragments") {
00256     vector < Fragment* > :: iterator frag;
00257     for (frag = _fragments.begin(); frag < _fragments.end(); ++frag){
00258          int id = (*frag)->getId();
00259          string name =  (*frag)->getName();
00260          name.resize(3);
00261          string resname = (*frag)->getSegment()->getName();
00262          resname.resize(3);
00263          int resnr = (*frag)->getSegment()->getId();
00264          vec position = (*frag)->getPos();  
00265 
00266          fprintf(out, "ATOM  %5d %4s%1s%3s %1s%4d%1s   "
00267                       "%8.3f%8.3f%8.3f%6.2f%6.2f      %4s%2s%2s\n",
00268                  id,                    // Atom serial number           %5d
00269                  name.c_str(),          // Atom name                    %4s
00270                  " ",                   // alternate location indicator.%1s
00271                  resname.c_str(),       // Residue name.                %3s
00272                  "A",                   // Chain identifier             %1s
00273                  resnr,                 // Residue sequence number      %4d
00274                  " ",                   // Insertion of residues.       %1s
00275                  position.getX()*10,    // X in Angstroms               %8.3f
00276                  position.getY()*10,    // Y in Angstroms               %8.3f
00277                  position.getZ()*10,    // Z in Angstroms               %8.3f
00278                  1.0,                   // Occupancy                    %6.2f
00279                  0.0,                   // Temperature factor           %6.2f
00280                  " ",                   // Segment identifier           %4s
00281                  name.c_str(),          // Element symbol               %2s
00282                  " "                    // Charge on the atom.          %2s
00283                  );
00284     }
00285   }
00286   else if ( tag1 == "Atoms") {
00287     vector < Atom* > :: iterator atm;
00288     for (atm = _atoms.begin(); atm < _atoms.end(); ++atm) {
00289          int id = (*atm)->getId() % 100000;
00290          string name =  (*atm)->getName();
00291          name.resize(3);
00292          string resname = (*atm)->getResname();
00293          resname.resize(3);
00294          int resnr = (*atm)->getResnr();
00295          vec position;
00296          if (tag2 == "MD")      { position = (*atm)->getPos(); }
00297          else if (tag2 == "QM") { position = (*atm)->getQMPos(); }
00298          if (tag2 == "QM" && (*atm)->HasQMPart() == false) { continue; }
00299 
00300          fprintf(out, "ATOM  %5d %4s%1s%3s %1s%4d%1s   "
00301                       "%8.3f%8.3f%8.3f%6.2f%6.2f      %4s%2s%2s\n",
00302                  id,                    // Atom serial number           %5d
00303                  name.c_str(),          // Atom name                    %4s
00304                  " ",                   // alternate location indicator.%1s
00305                  resname.c_str(),       // Residue name.                %3s
00306                  "A",                   // Chain identifier             %1s
00307                  resnr,                 // Residue sequence number      %4d
00308                  " ",                   // Insertion of residues.       %1s
00309                  position.getX()*10,    // X in Angstroms               %8.3f
00310                  position.getY()*10,    // Y in Angstroms               %8.3f
00311                  position.getZ()*10,    // Z in Angstroms               %8.3f
00312                  1.0,                   // Occupancy                    %6.2f
00313                  0.0,                   // Temperature factor           %6.2f
00314                  " ",                   // Segment identifier           %4s
00315                  name.c_str(),          // Element symbol               %2s
00316                  " "                    // Charge on the atom.          %2s
00317                  );
00318     }
00319   }
00320   else if ( tag1 == "Multipoles" && tag2 != "Charges") {
00321     vector < PolarSite* > :: iterator pol;
00322     for (pol = _polarSites.begin(); pol < _polarSites.end(); ++pol) {
00323          int id = (*pol)->getId() % 100000;
00324          string name =  (*pol)->getName();
00325          name.resize(3);
00326          string resname = (*pol)->getFragment()->getName();
00327          resname.resize(3);
00328          int resnr = (*pol)->getFragment()->getId() % 10000;
00329          vec position = (*pol)->getPos();
00330          
00331          fprintf(out, "ATOM  %5d %4s%1s%3s %1s%4d%1s   "
00332                       "%8.3f%8.3f%8.3f%6.2f%6.2f      %4s%2s%2s\n",
00333                  id,                    // Atom serial number           %5d
00334                  name.c_str(),          // Atom name                    %4s
00335                  " ",                   // alternate location indicator.%1s
00336                  resname.c_str(),       // Residue name.                %3s
00337                  "A",                   // Chain identifier             %1s
00338                  resnr,                 // Residue sequence number      %4d
00339                  " ",                   // Insertion of residues.       %1s
00340                  position.getX()*10,    // X in Angstroms               %8.3f
00341                  position.getY()*10,    // Y in Angstroms               %8.3f
00342                  position.getZ()*10,    // Z in Angstroms               %8.3f
00343                  1.0,                   // Occupancy                    %6.2f
00344                  0.0,                   // Temperature factor           %6.2f
00345                  " ",                   // Segment identifier           %4s
00346                  name.c_str(),          // Element symbol               %2s
00347                  " "                    // Charge on the atom.          %2s
00348                  );
00349     }
00350   }
00351     else if ( tag1 == "Multipoles" && tag2 == "Charges") {
00352     vector < PolarSite* > :: iterator pol;
00353     for (pol = _polarSites.begin(); pol < _polarSites.end(); ++pol) {
00354          int id = (*pol)->getId() % 100000;
00355          string name =  (*pol)->getName();
00356          name.resize(3);
00357          string resname = (*pol)->getFragment()->getName();
00358          resname.resize(3);
00359          int resnr = (*pol)->getFragment()->getId() % 10000;
00360          vec position = (*pol)->getPos();
00361 
00362          fprintf(out, "ATOM  %5d %4s%1s%3s %1s%4d%1s   "
00363                       "%8.3f%8.3f%8.3f%6.2f%6.2f      %4s%2s%2s%4.7f\n",
00364                  id,                    // Atom serial number           %5d
00365                  name.c_str(),          // Atom name                    %4s
00366                  " ",                   // alternate location indicator.%1s
00367                  resname.c_str(),       // Residue name.                %3s
00368                  "A",                   // Chain identifier             %1s
00369                  resnr,                 // Residue sequence number      %4d
00370                  " ",                   // Insertion of residues.       %1s
00371                  position.getX()*10,    // X in Angstroms               %8.3f
00372                  position.getY()*10,    // Y in Angstroms               %8.3f
00373                  position.getZ()*10,    // Z in Angstroms               %8.3f
00374                  1.0,                   // Occupancy                    %6.2f
00375                  0.0,                   // Temperature factor           %6.2f
00376                  " ",                   // Segment identifier           %4s
00377                  name.c_str(),          // Element symbol               %2s
00378                  " ",                   // Charge on the atom.          %2s
00379                  (*pol)->getQ00()
00380                  );
00381     }
00382   }
00383 }
00384 
00385 
00386 void Segment::WriteXYZ(FILE *out) {
00387 
00388     vector< Atom* > ::iterator ait;
00389 
00390     int qmatoms = 0;
00391 
00392     for (ait = _atoms.begin(); ait < _atoms.end(); ++ait) {
00393         if ((*ait)->HasQMPart() == true) { ++qmatoms; }
00394     }
00395 
00396     fprintf(out, "%6d \n", qmatoms);
00397     fprintf(out, "\n");
00398 
00399     for (ait = _atoms.begin(); ait < _atoms.end(); ++ait) {
00400 
00401         if ((*ait)->HasQMPart() == false) { continue; }
00402 
00403         vec     pos = (*ait)->getQMPos();
00404         string  name = (*ait)->getElement();
00405 
00406         fprintf(out, "%2s %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n",
00407                         name.c_str(),
00408                         pos.getX()*10,
00409                         pos.getY()*10,
00410                         pos.getZ()*10);
00411     }
00412 
00413 
00414 }
